summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4821 for the improvement of the alley in block 60, West Seattle Land & Improvement Company's 2nd Plat, and in block 2, Aldine Heights Addition, being the alley between California Avenue and 42nd Avenue Southwest, from West Walker Street to West Hill Street, by grading and paving the same, by providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 55653, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
